entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING ENDED, Baker Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:51 PM CST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Blowing Snow, -28.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Baker Lake Airport 3:00 PM CST Thursday 23 February 2023
Condition: Blowing Snow
Temperature: -28.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 0.6 km
Humidity: 69 %
Wind Chill: -46
Dewpoint: -32.5°C
Wind: NW 42 km/h gust 56 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of light snow and blowing snow. Low minus 31. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow overnight. Blowing snow. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 31. Wind chill near minus 49. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of light snow and blowing snow. High minus 29. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of light snow. Blowing snow in the morning. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 29. Wind chill minus 49 in the morning and minus 43 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 43 in the evening and minus 48 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Thursday 23 February 2023
